oai_dc:dc.dc:title: N-management in grass-arable crop rotations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eriksen, J.
Hansen, E.M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Dairy cattle

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nitrogen accumulation in grazed grassland is difficult to utilize efficiently, but appropriate farm management can minimize nitrate leaching.
